data.description: Perl wrapper for postgresql dblink module
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Dblink is a perl wrapper for postgresql dblink contrib module.
    Using this module, you are able to create dblink views in a
    database. A dblink view can query another database and return the
    results. It makes an implicit connection to the remote database.
    Refer the document on dblink contrib which is shipped with the
    source of postgresql for details.
